TopicTitle: Destiny - How realistic the solar system will be?

Articles.Content:
I just read an article in a magazine (how outdated. Magazines.) about this game and i'm interested. As much as I can tell about those pictures I saw, it's gonna be pretty awesome.

But since I play KSP quite a bit, and I like this kind of stuff, I thought about it for a little while. As the title suggests, i'm interested in if you go to a planet will it be realistic? I mean you go to Mars and it looks like Mars in real life or it at least what it could look like in the future? Or will out just be a sexy looking world which makes no sense?

I can't really tell. What do you think?
